articles.title: Chicago Cubs, Willson Contreras avoid arbitration; source says deal worth $9.625 million - ESPN
articles.description: The Cubs and Willson Contreras have reached an agreement on a contract for the 2022 season, with a source telling ESPN that the catcher will make $9.625 million.
